full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify for the Randle Reef Stage 3 ECF Cap Construction, Phase 2

#### Tender Details
• *Reference Number*: WS3873888363-Doc4007293241
• *Solicitation Number*: WS3873888363
• *Tender Closing Date*: 2023-07-05T14:00:00 (2:00 PM EDT)
• *Contracting Entity*: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
• *Trade Agreements*: Applies to qualified suppliers under the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement

#### Project Overview
The Randle Reef Stage 3 project requires the construction of an engineered multi-layer cap on top of the Environmental Containment Facility (ECF). This is the second phase of a two-phase process, where the qualified suppliers will submit a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

#### Requirements
The successful contractor will possess the necessary qualifications, skills, and experience required to complete the project. The scope of work includes construction of the engineered multi-layer cap on top of the ECF.

#### Important Dates
• *Publication Date*: 2023-05-18
• *Amendment Date*: 2023-06-29

#### Contact Information
The contact person for this tender is Dhanna, Sheila. She can be reached at (elle-la / she-her) by email at [sheila.dhanna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sheila.dhanna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).  Further information is also available through the SAP Ariba RFx Event.

### Note
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-07-05 by 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
